metadata.title: HytaleDocs
metadata.description: Community documentation for Hytale. Gameplay, modding, servers and API reference guides.

megaMenu.moddingFeaturedDesc: Learn the fundamentals of Hytale modding and create your first mod
megaMenu.serversFeaturedDesc: Complete guide to hosting and managing Hytale servers
megaMenu.pluginsDesc: Create Java plugins with events, commands, and ECS
megaMenu.eventsDesc: Complete reference for all server events
megaMenu.dataAssetsDesc: Blocks, items, NPCs and game data

hero.subtitle: The community documentation for Hytale
hero.description: Gameplay guides, modding, server administration and API reference.
hero.descriptionLine2: Everything you need to master Hytale.

navCards.title: EXPLORE THE WIKI
navCards.subtitle: Find everything you need to start developing for Hytale
navCards.moddingDesc: Create custom blocks, items, NPCs, and more. Learn the fundamentals of Hytale modding.
navCards.serversDesc: Set up, configure, and manage Hytale game servers. From basic setup to advanced administration.
navCards.apiDesc: Explore the official Hytale API. Authentication, endpoints, and SDK documentation.
navCards.toolsDesc: Master Blockbench, the Asset Editor, and other essential development tools.
navCards.guidesDesc: Step-by-step tutorials to help you create your first block, item, NPC, and more.
navCards.communityDesc: Join the community, contribute to the wiki, and connect with other developers.

updates.title: LATEST UPDATES
updates.subtitle: Recent additions and changes to the documentation
updates.serverInternalsDesc: Technical v1 documentation of the Hytale server - Plugins, Events, ECS, Packets and more
updates.serverCalculatorDesc: Calculate recommended RAM, CPU and storage for your server
updates.projectGeneratorDesc: Generate a complete plugin or mod project structure
updates.jsonValidatorDesc: Validate your JSON files against Hytale schemas

community.title: JOIN THE COMMUNITY
community.subtitle: Connect with other Hytale developers and contribute to the project
community.discordDesc: Join our Discord server to chat with other developers
community.githubDesc: Contribute to the wiki and explore the source code
community.ctaText: Want to contribute to the wiki?

footer.description: Community documentation for Hytale. Guides, tutorials and references for players and developers.
footer.copyright: HytaleDocs. Not affiliated with Hypixel Studios.

tools.title: Developer Tools
tools.subtitle: Interactive tools to help you develop Hytale mods, plugins, and servers.
tools.serverCalculatorDesc: Calculate recommended RAM, CPU, and storage based on player count and view distance
tools.projectGeneratorDesc: Generate plugin or mod project structure with correct folder layout and starter files
tools.jsonValidatorDesc: Validate your blocks, items, NPCs, and manifest.json files against Hytale schemas
tools.basedOnOfficialDesc: These tools are built using information from official Hytale blog posts and documentation. Requirements and specifications may change as the game evolves.

serverCalculator.title: Server Requirements Calculator
serverCalculator.subtitle: Estimate the hardware requirements for your Hytale server based on player count and view distance.
serverCalculator.serverConfigDesc: Adjust the sliders to match your expected server load
serverCalculator.viewDistanceNote: Doubling view distance quadruples server load

projectGenerator.title: Project Generator
projectGenerator.subtitle: Generate a project structure for your Hytale plugin or mod with all the necessary files.
projectGenerator.author: Author

jsonValidator.title: JSON Validator
jsonValidator.subtitle: Validate your Hytale JSON files against expected schemas.
jsonValidator.blockDesc: Block definition JSON for custom blocks
jsonValidator.itemDesc: Item definition JSON for custom items
jsonValidator.clickToValidate: Click Validate to check your JSON
jsonValidator.aboutDesc: This validator checks your JSON against schemas based on official Hytale documentation. Note that Hytale is in Early Access and schemas may change. Always test your content in-game.

cookies.title: We use cookies
cookies.description: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience, analyze site traffic, and show personalized ads. You can customize your preferences below.
cookies.privacyNote: You can change your preferences at any time from
cookies.preferencesDescription: Manage your cookie preferences. Essential cookies are required for the website to function and cannot be disabled.

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.description: These cookies are necessary for the website to function properly. They enable basic features like page navigation and access to secure areas.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting anonymous information about pages visited and user behavior.

advertising.title: Advertising Cookies
advertising.description: These cookies are used to show you relevant advertisements based on your interests. They may track your browsing activity across different websites.

adblock.title: Support HytaleDocs
adblock.message: We noticed you're using an ad blocker. Ads help us keep this documentation free and updated. Consider disabling it for our site!

intro.title: Introduction
intro.content: HytaleDocs ("we", "our", or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you visit our website hytale-docs.com. This policy complies with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and other applicable data protection laws.

lawfulBasis.title: Lawful Basis for Processing
lawfulBasis.content: We process your personal data based on the following lawful bases under GDPR Article 6:
lawfulBasis.consentDesc: For non-essential cookies (analytics and advertising), we obtain your explicit consent through our cookie banner before processing.
lawfulBasis.legitimateInterestDesc: For website security, fraud prevention, and improving our services. We ensure our interests do not override your fundamental rights.
lawfulBasis.contractDesc: When necessary to provide you with requested services or respond to your inquiries.

dataCollection.title: Information We Collect
dataCollection.content: We collect information to provide and improve our services:
dataCollection.item1: Usage data (pages visited, time spent, browser type)

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience:
cookies.essentialDesc: Required for the website to function properly
cookies.analyticsDesc: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website
cookies.detailsIntro: Below is a detailed list of cookies we use on this website:
cookies.gaCookieDesc: Google Analytics - tracks anonymous usage statistics

retention.title: Data Retention Policy
retention.content: We retain your personal data only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which it was collected:
retention.analyticsDesc: Aggregated and anonymized data is retained for up to 26 months. Individual session data is not stored.
retention.cookiesDesc: Your cookie consent preferences are stored for 1 year, after which you will be asked to consent again.
retention.logsDesc: Server access logs containing IP addresses are retained for 30 days for security purposes, then automatically deleted.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.content: We use the following third-party services:
thirdParty.adsense: Google AdSense displays advertisements. Google may use cookies to personalize ads based on your browsing history. You can opt out of personalized advertising at https://adssettings.google.com
thirdParty.analytics: Privacy-focused analytics to understand site usage without tracking personal data.

transfers.title: International Data Transfers
transfers.content: Some of our third-party service providers are located outside the European Economic Area (EEA). When we transfer your data internationally, we ensure appropriate safeguards are in place:
transfers.google: Located in the United States. Transfers are protected under the EU-US Data Privacy Framework.
transfers.vercel: Our hosting provider, located in the United States. Transfers are protected under Standard Contractual Clauses (SCCs).
transfers.safeguards: We ensure all international transfers comply with GDPR requirements through adequacy decisions, Standard Contractual Clauses, or other approved transfer mechanisms.

gdprRights.title: Your Rights Under GDPR
gdprRights.intro: Under the General Data Protection Regulation, you have the following rights regarding your personal data:
gdprRights.accessDesc: You can request a copy of all personal data we hold about you.
gdprRights.rectificationDesc: You can request correction of any inaccurate or incomplete personal data.
gdprRights.erasureDesc: You can request deletion of your personal data ("right to be forgotten") when it is no longer necessary for processing.
gdprRights.restrictionDesc: You can request that we limit how we use your data while a complaint is being resolved.
gdprRights.portabilityDesc: You can request your data in a structured, machine-readable format to transfer to another service.
gdprRights.objectDesc: You can object to processing based on legitimate interests, including profiling and direct marketing.
gdprRights.withdrawDesc: Where processing is based on consent, you can withdraw your consent at any time without affecting prior processing.
gdprRights.exerciseRights: To exercise any of these rights, please contact us using the details provided in the Data Protection Contact section below.

dpo.title: Data Protection Contact
dpo.content: For any questions, concerns, or requests regarding your personal data and privacy rights, you can contact us through:
dpo.githubDesc: Open an issue on our GitHub repository
dpo.response: We will respond to all legitimate requests within 30 days. In complex cases, we may extend this by an additional 60 days, and we will inform you of any such extension.

complaint.title: Right to Lodge a Complaint
complaint.content: If you believe your data protection rights have been violated, you have the right to lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority. You can contact the data protection authority in your country of residence, place of work, or where the alleged infringement occurred. A list of EU data protection authorities can be found at https://edpb.europa.eu/about-edpb/about-edpb/members_en

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the new policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date. We encourage you to review this policy periodically.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us through our GitHub repository or at privacy@hytale-docs.com.

docProgress.title: Documentation in Progress
docProgress.dialogDescription: We are actively working on completing the documentation. Some sections may be incomplete or missing.

docsDisclaimer.title: Community Documentation
docsDisclaimer.message: This documentation may contain errors. Always verify against actual code.
docsDisclaimer.toastMessage: This documentation is community-maintained and based on decompiled code. Some information may be inaccurate or outdated.

error.title: Something went wrong
error.description: An unexpected error occurred while loading this page.
error.details: We apologize for the inconvenience. Please try again or return to the homepage.

notFound.title: Page not found
notFound.description: The page you are looking for does not exist or has been moved.
notFound.suggestion: Try searching for what you need or browse our documentation.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using HytaleDocs, you accept and agree to be bound by these Terms of Use. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our website. These terms constitute a legally binding agreement between you and HytaleDocs.

use.title: Use of Content
use.content: The content on HytaleDocs is provided for informational and educational purposes. You may use the documentation for personal and commercial projects related to Hytale development, subject to the license terms specified below.

content.title: User Contributions
content.content: If you contribute content to HytaleDocs, you grant us a non-exclusive, worldwide, royalty-free license to use, modify, reproduce, and distribute your contributions as part of the documentation. You represent that you have the right to make such contributions.

license.title: Content License
license.content: Content on HytaleDocs is made available under specific license terms:
license.documentationDesc: All documentation text, guides, and tutorials are licensed under Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY 4.0). You may share and adapt the content for any purpose, including commercial use, with appropriate attribution.
license.codeDesc: Code snippets and examples are licensed under the MIT License. You are free to use, modify, and distribute code examples without restriction.
license.attributionDesc: When using CC BY 4.0 content, please credit "HytaleDocs (hytale-docs.com)" and indicate if changes were made.
license.restrictions: Restrictions: You may not claim official affiliation with Hypixel Studios or Riot Games when using our content. Hytale trademarks and assets remain property of their respective owners.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer of Warranties
disclaimer.content: HytaleDocs is provided "AS IS" and "AS AVAILABLE" without warranties of any kind, either express or implied, including but not limited to implied warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, accuracy, and non-infringement. We do not guarantee the accuracy, completeness, reliability, or timeliness of the information. Hytale is in Early Access and specifications may change without notice. We make no warranty that the website will be uninterrupted, secure, or error-free.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: To the fullest extent permitted by applicable law, HytaleDocs and its contributors shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, including but not limited to:
liability.item1: Loss of profits, data, or business opportunities
liability.item2: Damages resulting from use or inability to use the website
liability.item3: Damages resulting from reliance on any information obtained through the website
liability.item4: Damages caused by third-party content or services linked from our website
liability.cap: Our total liability for any claim arising from your use of the website shall not exceed the amount you have paid us (if any) for accessing premium services in the 12 months preceding the claim. As a free community resource, this typically means zero liability.

indemnification.title: Indemnification
indemnification.content: You agree to indemnify, defend, and hold harmless HytaleDocs, its maintainers, contributors, and affiliates from any claims, liabilities, damages, losses, and expenses (including reasonable legal fees) arising from:
indemnification.item1: Your use of the website or any content obtained from it
indemnification.item2: Your violation of these Terms of Use
indemnification.item3: Your violation of any third-party rights, including intellectual property rights

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Links
thirdParty.content: Our website may contain links to third-party websites and services. We are not responsible for the content, privacy policies, or practices of these external sites. Your use of third-party websites is at your own risk, and we encourage you to review their terms and policies.

affiliation.title: No Affiliation
affiliation.content: HytaleDocs is an independent community project and is not affiliated with, endorsed by, sponsored by, or connected to Hypixel Studios, Riot Games, or any of their affiliates. Hytale is a registered trademark of Hypixel Studios. All other trademarks are property of their respective owners.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: We reserve the right to terminate or suspend your access to the website at any time, without prior notice or liability, for any reason, including violation of these Terms. Upon termination, all provisions of these Terms which by their nature should survive shall survive, including ownership provisions, warranty disclaimers, indemnity, and limitations of liability.

disputes.title: Dispute Resolution
disputes.content: Any disputes arising from these Terms or your use of the website shall be resolved through the following process:
disputes.informalDesc: We encourage you to contact us first to resolve any issues informally. Most concerns can be resolved quickly through direct communication via our GitHub repository.
disputes.mediationDesc: If informal resolution is unsuccessful, parties agree to attempt mediation before pursuing legal action.
disputes.legalDesc: If mediation fails, disputes shall be resolved through the courts specified in the Governing Law section.

governing.title: Governing Law
governing.content: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the European Union and the applicable member state where the primary maintainer resides, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.
governing.jurisdiction: You agree that any legal action or proceeding arising out of these Terms shall be brought exclusively in the courts of the European Union member state where the primary maintainer resides, and you consent to the jurisdiction of such courts.

severability.title: Severability
severability.content: If any provision of these Terms is found to be unenforceable or invalid by a court of competent jurisdiction, that provision shall be limited or eliminated to the minimum extent necessary so that these Terms shall otherwise remain in full force and effect.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Material changes will be communicated by updating the "Last updated" date at the top of this page. Continued use of the website after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms. We encourage you to review these Terms periodically.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.content: For questions about these Terms of Use, please contact us through our GitHub repository at https://github.com/HytaleDocs/wiki-next or via email at legal@hytale-docs.com.

unverifiedModal.title: AI-Generated Content
unverifiedModal.subtitle: This page has not been verified yet
unverifiedModal.aiGeneratedWarning: This documentation page was automatically generated by AI and has not yet been verified by a human. The information presented may be inaccurate, incomplete, or outdated.
unverifiedModal.issue3: Outdated information from older server versions
unverifiedModal.verifiedPagesNote: Pages marked with a green checkmark in the sidebar have been tested with a real plugin and are considered reliable.
unverifiedModal.acknowledgeButton: I understand, show me the content
unverifiedModal.reportNote: Found an error? Please report it on

eventsRef.quickStartDesc: Get started with events in seconds
eventsRef.learnMore: Learn more about the event system

roleCards.creatorDesc: Create blocks, items, NPCs, models and textures
roleCards.developerDesc: Java plugins, events, commands, ECS system

update.title: Update Available
update.description: A new version of HytaleDocs is ready. Refresh to get the latest features and improvements.

install.title: Install HytaleDocs
install.description: Add HytaleDocs to your device for quick access and offline browsing.
install.feature1: Fast access from your home screen

iosInstructions.title: Install on iOS
iosInstructions.description: To install HytaleDocs on your iPhone or iPad, follow these steps:
iosInstructions.step1: Tap the Share button in Safari's toolbar
iosInstructions.step2: Scroll down and tap "Add to Home Screen"

androidInstructions.title: Install on Android
androidInstructions.description: To install HytaleDocs, use Chrome and look for the install option.
androidInstructions.step1: Tap the menu button (three dots) and select "Add to Home screen" or "Install app"

openApp.title: HytaleDocs is installed
openApp.description: Open the app for a better experience
